name: 陳雙源
objective: 先修課程：半導體元件物理或負責教授同意。課程簡介，MOS元件，MOS元件特性，MOS元件參數，MOS元件設計，參數粹取，氧化層可靠性分析，熱載子效應，可靠性分析。
schedule:
1.Introduction.
2.MOS structure
3.CV measurement
4.Charge pumping method
5.MOSFETs
6.MOSFET scaling
7.Thermal SiO2
8.Mid. term examination
9.Oxide breakdown
10.Hot carrier effect
11.NBTI
12.Oxynitride
13.High-k oxide
14.Lab. on measurement
15.Lab. on measurement
16.Paper review
17.Paper review
18.Final examination
scorePolicy: 期中、期末及平常成績各佔1/3。
materials:
T. Hori, Gate Dielectrics and MOS ULSIs.
Relative papers.
